Senior Behavioral Scientist at Rethink Priorities
Research Affiliate at Tilburg University
Senior Behavioral Scientist at Rethink Priorities
Tenure track Assistant Professor in social psychology at Tilburg University
Fixed term Assistant Professor in social psychology at Tilburg University
Graduate student at Tilburg University supervised by prof. dr. Ilja van Beest and dr. Travis Proulx
Student member of the Kurt Lewin Institute (KLI)
Research Master Behavioural Science at Nijmegen University
Honours Program of Psychology at Nijmegen University

default.content: Best Dissertation Award 2017 by the Dutch Association for Social Psychological Researchers (ASPO)
NWO Open Science Fund for "tidystats: A reference manager for statistics"
NWO Open Competition SSH for "Physiostracism: Using physiology to predict prosocial and antisocial responses to ostracism"

Courses.content: Research Master: Experimental Research and Meta-Analysis

Individual lectures.content: Introduction and History of Psychology on intrapersonal conflict
Introduction to Social Psychology for prospective students

Other.content: An introduction to R; part of the Kurt Lewin Institute course program

Department.content: Organized the Voluntary Research Assistance (VRA) program

Faculty.content: Member of the Tilburg School of Social and Behavioral Sciences PhD-council from 2014 to 2016

Workshops.content: Organized a workshop on Bayesian Statistics for Behavioural Scientists by dr. E.J. Wagenmakers at Radboud University
Organized a workshop on Latent Growth Modeling using SEM by dr. Reinoud Stoel at Radboud University

Conferences.content: ASPO dissertation prize committee member from 2014 to 2015

Statistics.content: Advanced statistical modelling (e.g., multilevel (Bayesian) regression, meta-analysis, factor analysis)

Programming.content: HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, WebR, Python
